titles.title: Protecting Employees Tips Act
To amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to prohibit employers from keeping employees' tips to cover the cost of financial transaction fees.
Protecting Employees Tips Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary:
Protecting Employees Tips Act
This bill prohibits an employer from keeping any portion of the tips paid to its employees to cover credit or debit card transaction fees charged by a card issuer.
